- Interior HVAC return vent; rectangular metal grille with screws in frame.  
- Material: Metal/plated steel with white paint finish.  
- Condition: Minor paint chipping at frame corners; no rust visible.  
- Seams: Small crack/separation line below vent along wall/ceiling joint; potential minor settlement crack.  
- Obstructions: No debris or blockages visible in grille; airflow appears unobstructed.
